call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - January 9th 2025

decisions.decision: Having a party for emission dropping below 20 ERG per block
decisions.speaker: kushti
decisions.context: Chris Ray proposed it as psychologically important milestone
decisions.quote: we will have a party in coming days in form of I don't know maybe Twitter spaces or zoom call

commitments.commitment: Start banging out code and prototypes for decentralized lithium pricing index
commitments.quote: We're going to start banging out some code and some prototypes really soon

commitments.commitment: Publish protocol client version for public testnet 6.0
commitments.timeline: around the beginning of next week
commitments.quote: protocol client version for public testnet 6.0 client, I mean, will be published around the beginning of the next week, if no more issues will be found

commitments.commitment: Preparing new minor releases for Sigma interpreter and protocol client
commitments.quote: preparing also new minor releases for Sigma interpreter and the protocol client

commitments.commitment: Ergo will be in Ledger Live
commitments.quote: hopefully in a few weeks then Ergo will be in Ledger Live

commitments.commitment: Filming part two of documentary when returning to Argentina
commitments.quote: Part two is going to be we're going to be filming that when we go back to Argentina

commitments.commitment: Drop TGE dates for Palm Token
commitments.quote: In the next few hours, we're actually going to drop the dates for TGE

commitments.commitment: Be at many more AMAs this year
commitments.quote: I will be at many more of these this year. I will make sure that I make the time

open_questions.question: Need for contributors to finish and publish UI for Dexy Gold launch
How to make Argentinian Bitcoin mining operation work with Ergo given most equipment is ASIC
SigmaUSD protocol updates depend on decision from five update key holders

key_facts.fact: Emission dropped to 18 per block from 21 around the past weekend
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Three years ago emission was 67.5 ERG per block, now just 18
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Current emission is about 13k ERG per day
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: 6.0 security audit is ongoing with Dusek finding a few issues
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: PHP coin was minted in 2020, miners collected whole supply after 4 years, then relaunched as meme coin
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Palm has raised approximately 1.5 million ADA through several rounds
key_facts.speaker: Dan Friedman

key_facts.fact: Dan speaks Russian, English, and Japanese fluently, plus rusty Ukrainian
key_facts.speaker: Dan Friedman
